seller.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a person or organization that sells something
seller.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: Most sellers use an estate agent to set a price and advertise the property.
In the UK sellers of alcohol must be at least 18.
seller.translation[1].definitions[1].def: a product that sells well or badly
seller.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: The book is among the 10top sellers of all time.
Frozen yoghurt has been a big seller over the past two years.
